Posts.EditableText: Lodus by Paul Gillen http://www.axeuk.com/quest/games/lodus.zip "You are Lodus, a wise old wizard approaching the twilight of your life. The years have aged you leaving your body frail and your hair as white as snow, but you are still able to get around with the help of your walking stick." Posts.HTML:
Lodus by Paul Gillen
http://www.axeuk.com/quest/games/lodus.zip

"You are Lodus, a wise old wizard approaching the twilight of your life. The years have aged you leaving your body frail and your hair as white as snow, but you are still able to get around with the help of your walking stick."

Please post any reviews, comments, requests for help etc. to this thread.
